â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Take one of the most modern, fun and engaging board games created in    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ recent years. Match it with cutting-edge technology. Add a              â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ ridiculously well-crafted art style and a ton of extra content. This    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ is the recipe to one of the most thrilling, charming and captivating    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ strategy games you will ever find.                                      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Heroes of Normandie is fast-paced. You are placed in command of small   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ squads in scenarios of varying sizes, in the middle of the D-Day        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ bombastic and humorous yet full of subtle tactical decisions and        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ features a vast array of unique units, equipment and abilities.         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ engage in a quick skirmish, survive through the rogue like mini         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
